testcase.name: API Key Management - Creation Flow › should display generated API key after creation
API Key Management - Creation Flow › should provide copy-to-clipboard for new API key
API Key Management - Listing & Display › should display existing API keys in a table/list
API Key Management - Listing & Display › should show API key metadata (name, created date, scopes)
API Key Management - Listing & Display › should mask API key values in listing
API Key Management - Listing & Display › should display scopes as badges/tags
API Key Management - Revocation › should show revoke/delete button for each API key
API Key Management - Revocation › should show confirmation dialog before revoking key
API Key Management - Revocation › should allow canceling revocation
API Key Management - Permissions › should not allow non-authenticated users to access API keys page
API Key Management - Permissions › should display API key count/usage statistics
